title: Language Update
description: We have updated the Afrikaans language to include accurate translations that were provided by a native.

title: New Feature
description: Add the ability for individuals to use the report section under the detailed profile menu to report a users actions.
author: Aaron

title: New Feature
description: Add the ability for individuals to use the search section under the detailed profile menu to search for messages sent in a chat.
author: Aaron
